briefdescription.para: Stores the association between account names and their corresponding passwords.

detaileddescription.para: Uses custom hash table implementation with chaining collision resolution.

briefdescription.para: The master password used for authentication.

detaileddescription.para: This final field stores the master password that is utilized for user authentication and securing the credentials.

briefdescription.para: The storage implementation for passwords.
Access pattern tracking using sparse matrix.
Undo stack for command pattern.
Service dependency graph.
Redo stack for command pattern.
Pending operations queue.
Constructor initializing the manager with a master password.

detaileddescription.para: Initializes the credentials map and loads stored credentials.

briefdescription.para: Constructor with specified storage type.

parameterdescription.para: The type of storage to use.

briefdescription.para: Adds a new credential.

detaileddescription.para: Inserts the credential for the given account into the internal storage and saves it.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves a credential.

detaileddescription.para: Fetches the password associated with the specified account.

simplesect.para: Password if account exists; otherwise, returns null.

briefdescription.para: Gets access pattern for a specific service.

simplesect.para: Map of hour to access count

briefdescription.para: Gets the most accessed services.

parameterdescription.para: Number of top services to return

simplesect.para: List of service names sorted by access count

briefdescription.para: Gets total access count for a service.
Undoes the last operation.

simplesect.para: true if undo was successful, false if nothing to undo

briefdescription.para: Redoes the last undone operation.

simplesect.para: true if redo was successful, false if nothing to redo

briefdescription.para: Checks if undo is available.

simplesect.para: true if there are operations to undo

briefdescription.para: Checks if redo is available.

simplesect.para: true if there are operations to redo

briefdescription.para: Displays the interactive menu and processes user input.

detaileddescription.para: Uses dependency injection for Scanner and PrintStream to enable unit testing. Provides options to add, retrieve credentials, generate passwords, or exit.

parameterdescription.para: The Scanner object for reading user input.
The PrintStream object for writing output.

briefdescription.para: Gets most used services sorted by usage count using heap sort.

detaileddescription.para: Combines access matrix data with heap sort for efficient ranking.

simplesect.para: List of services sorted by usage count

briefdescription.para: Analyzes service dependencies and returns related services.

detaileddescription.para: Uses BFS to find all services reachable from the given service.

briefdescription.para: Adds a dependency relationship between two services.
Gets all strongly connected components in service dependencies.
Gets the service dependency graph.
Queues a pending operation.
Processes all pending operations.
Gets the count of pending operations.
Peeks at the next pending operation without removing it.

simplesect.para: Next operation or null if queue is empty

briefdescription.para: Gets the pending operations queue.
Loads credentials from storage.
Records a service access in the access matrix.
Generates a new password and saves it for a service.

parameterdescription.para: The Scanner object for user input.

briefdescription.para: Sorts service usage data using heap sort algorithm.

detaileddescription.para: Time Complexity: O(n log n) Space Complexity: O(1) - in-place sorting

briefdescription.para: Maintains heap property for a subtree.
Runs the application using the provided Scanner and PrintStream.

detaileddescription.para: Initiates the application by requesting the master password and then invoking the interactive menu.

briefdescription.para: Main method to launch the console application.

detaileddescription.para: Entry point of the application. Initializes input and output streams, then invokes the runApp method.

briefdescription.para: Main class for the Password Manager application.

detaileddescription.para:
Password Manager Team
1.0
Manages secure storage and retrieval of credentials using a master password. Includes advanced data structures: Sparse Matrix for access pattern tracking.
